languages.text: Магос Биологис, заботящиеся о священных ирригационных установках Януса, заинтересовались обнаруженными на планете уникальными веществами. Если им будут предоставлены ресурсы для возведения капеллы, они погрузятся в таинства химсинтеза, способного превратить смертельные токсины в содержимое целительных медкомплектов.

traits.locale_text: Позволить Магос Биологис разверхнуть алхимическую капеллу на Янусе (им интересны органические химикаты мира).

languages.text: The Magos Biologis, custodians of Janus's sacred irrigation plants, have taken an interest to the unique substances discovered on the planet. If provided with the resources for erecting a chapel, they will delve into the mysteries of chem-synthesis, which can turn deadly toxins into the basic substances needed for life-saving medicae kits.
languages.original_text: Магос Биологис, заботящиеся о священных ирригационных установках Януса, заинтересовались обнаруженными на планете уникальными веществами. Если им будут предоставлены ресурсы для возведения капеллы, они погрузятся в таинства химсинтеза, способного превратить смертельные токсины в содержимое целительных медкомплектов.

traits.locale_text: The Magos Biologis, custodians of Janus' sacred irrigation plants, have taken an interest to the unique substances discovered on the planet. If provided with the resources for erecting a chapel, they will delve into the mysteries of chem-synthesis, which can turn deadly toxins into the contents of life-saving medicae kits.

The Magos Biologis, custodians of Janus' sacred irrigation plants, have taken an interest to the unique substances discovered on the planet. If provided with the resources for erecting a chapel, they will delve into the mysteries of chem-synthesis, which can turn deadly toxins into the contents of life-saving medicae kits.

The Magos Biologis, custodians of Janus' sacred irrigation plants, have taken an interest to the unique substances discovered on the planet. If provided with the resources for erecting a chapel, they will delve into the mysteries of chem-synthesis, which can turn deadly toxins into the basic substances needed for life-saving medicae kits.

The Magos Biologis, custodians of Janus's sacred irrigation plants, have taken an interest to the unique substances discovered on the planet. If provided with the resources for erecting a chapel, they will delve into the mysteries of chem-synthesis, which can turn deadly toxins into the basic substances needed for life-saving medicae kits.

The Magos Biologis, custodians of Janus's sacred irrigation plants, have taken an interest to the unique substances discovered on the planet. If provided with the resources for erecting a chapel, they will delve into the mysteries of chem-synthesis, which can turn deadly toxins into the basic substances needed for life-saving medicae kits.

languages.text: Los Magos Biologis, protectores de las sagradas plantas de regadío de Janus, se han interesado por las sustancias únicas que hay en el planeta. Si se les proporcionan los recursos para construir una capilla, indagarán en los misterios de la síntesis química, que permiten convertir toxinas letales en sustancias básicas necesarias para kits de medicae.
languages.original_text: The Magos Biologis, custodians of Janus's sacred irrigation plants, have taken an interest to the unique substances discovered on the planet. If provided with the resources for erecting a chapel, they will delve into the mysteries of chem-synthesis, which can turn deadly toxins into the basic substances needed for life-saving medicae kits.

traits.locale_text: Los Magos Biologis, protectores de las sagradas plantas de regadío de Janus, se han interesado por las sustancias únicas que hay en el planeta. Si se les proporcionan los recursos para construir una capilla, indagarán en los misterios de la síntesis química, que permiten convertir toxinas letales en sustancias básicas necesarias para kits de medicae.

languages.text: Les membres du Magos Biologis, gardiens des systèmes d'irrigation sacrés de Janus, se sont pris d'intérêt pour les substances uniques découvertes sur la planète. En échange des ressources nécessaires à la construction d'une chapelle, ils étudieront les mystères de la chimiosynthèse, un processus capable de transformer des toxines mortelles en éléments basiques entrant dans la composition des trousses medicae.
languages.original_text: The Magos Biologis, custodians of Janus's sacred irrigation plants, have taken an interest to the unique substances discovered on the planet. If provided with the resources for erecting a chapel, they will delve into the mysteries of chem-synthesis, which can turn deadly toxins into the basic substances needed for life-saving medicae kits.

traits.locale_text: Les membres du Magos Biologis, gardiens des systèmes d'irrigation sacrés de Janus, se sont pris d'intérêt pour les substances uniques découvertes sur la planète. En échange des ressources nécessaires à la construction d'une chapelle, ils étudieront les mystères de la chimiosynthèse, un processus capable de transformer des toxines mortelles en éléments basiques entrant dans la composition des trousses medicae.

languages.text: 负责看管加努斯神圣灌溉植物的生物贤者，对这里发现的某种独特物质很感兴趣。如果为他们提供建造礼拜堂所需的资源，他们将可以深入研究化学合成的奥秘，将致命的毒素转化为医疗急救箱中必不可少的基本物质。
languages.original_text: The Magos Biologis, custodians of Janus's sacred irrigation plants, have taken an interest to the unique substances discovered on the planet. If provided with the resources for erecting a chapel, they will delve into the mysteries of chem-synthesis, which can turn deadly toxins into the basic substances needed for life-saving medicae kits.

traits.locale_text: 负责看管加努斯神圣灌溉植物的生物贤者，对这里发现的某种独特物质很感兴趣。如果为他们提供建造礼拜堂所需的资源，他们将可以深入研究化学合成的奥秘，将致命的毒素转化为医疗急救箱中必不可少的基本物质。

languages.text: ヤヌスの神聖な灌漑植物の管理者である生物学賢人は、この惑星で発見されたユニークな物質に関心を寄せている。もし礼拝堂を建てるための資源が提供されれば、彼らは化学合成物の謎に迫り、致命的な毒素を救命用のメディケアキットに必要な基本物質に変えることができるだろう。
languages.original_text: The Magos Biologis, custodians of Janus's sacred irrigation plants, have taken an interest to the unique substances discovered on the planet. If provided with the resources for erecting a chapel, they will delve into the mysteries of chem-synthesis, which can turn deadly toxins into the basic substances needed for life-saving medicae kits.

traits.locale_text: ヤヌスの神聖な灌漑植物の管理者である生物学賢人は、この惑星で発見されたユニークな物質に関心を寄せている。もし礼拝堂を建てるための資源が提供されれば、彼らは化学合成物の謎に迫り、致命的な毒素を救命用のメディケアキットに必要な基本物質に変えることができるだろう。

languages.text: Die Magos Biologis, Hüter der heiligen Bewässerungsanlagen von Janus, interessieren sich für die einzigartigen Substanzen, die auf dem Planeten entdeckt wurden. Wenn man ihnen die Ressourcen für den Bau einer Kapelle zur Verfügung stellt, tauchen sie in die Mysterien der Chem-Synthese ein, die tödliche Giftstoffe in die Grundbausteine lebensrettender Medicae-Sets verwandeln kann.
languages.original_text: The Magos Biologis, custodians of Janus's sacred irrigation plants, have taken an interest to the unique substances discovered on the planet. If provided with the resources for erecting a chapel, they will delve into the mysteries of chem-synthesis, which can turn deadly toxins into the basic substances needed for life-saving medicae kits.

traits.locale_text: Die Magos Biologis, Hüter der heiligen Bewässerungsanlagen von Janus, interessieren sich für die einzigartigen Substanzen, die auf dem Planeten entdeckt wurden. Wenn man ihnen die Ressourcen für den Bau einer Kapelle zur Verfügung stellt, tauchen sie in die Mysterien der Chem-Synthese ein, die tödliche Giftstoffe in die Grundbausteine lebensrettender Medicae-Sets verwandeln kann.

languages.text: Janus'un kutsal tarım tesislerinden sorumlu Magos Biyologis, gezegende keşfedilen eşsiz maddelere ilgi duymakta. Bir şapelin kurulması için gerekli kaynaklar sağlandığı takdirde kimyevi sentezin sırlarını araştıracaklar. Bu sırlar, hayat kurtaran sıhhiye çantalarının üretimi için gereken temel maddelerin ölümcül toksinlerden elde edilmesini sağlayabilir.
languages.original_text: The Magos Biologis, custodians of Janus's sacred irrigation plants, have taken an interest to the unique substances discovered on the planet. If provided with the resources for erecting a chapel, they will delve into the mysteries of chem-synthesis, which can turn deadly toxins into the basic substances needed for life-saving medicae kits.
